item.title: Alpha-Gal Syndrome, the Meat Allergy, Expands Its Reach
item.description: The tick-borne allergy to animal products is on the move north and west from the Mid-Atlantic and Southern states. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Levothyroxine Shows No Added CVD Risk in Older Women
item.description: Studies evaluate levothyroxine’s impact on cardiovascular disease risk in midlife and older women and in adults with subclinical hypothyroidism. Medsc...

item.title: AAP Releases Guidance on Managing Food Allergies in Schools
item.description: The report updates the AAP’s 2010 guidance and emphasizes a proactive role for pediatricians in collaborating to manage student food allergies. Medsca...

item.title: Lamivudine/Dolutegravir Shows Real-World Efficacy in HIV
item.description: Lamivudine/dolutegravir is effective as first-line therapy for HIV infection, with low rates of treatment failure. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Depression, Anxiety Affect Patients With Fibromyalgia
item.description: Depression or anxiety occurs in nearly half of patients with fibromyalgia, a new global meta-analysis shows. Medscape Medical News
